bwwExcerpt: The production at the Benedum is outstanding. Zoe Jensen plays Glinda with the over-the-top narcissism that defines the role and makes it so fun, but also delivers depth of character. She is the perfect complement to Jessie Davidson’s Elphaba, who strikes an inspired balance of nerdiness, compassion, intellect and determination. And, boy, can she sing.
